marshall_webapp

Astronomical-transient marshalling webapp for curating and managing streams of object observations generated by wide-field surveys

v3.0.10

templates_xmatches (class) ∞

class templates_xmatches(log, request, elementId=False, search=False)[source] ∞

Bases: object

The worker class for the templates_xmatches module

Key Arguments

  • log – logger

  • request – the pyramid/WebObs request object

  • elementId – the specific element requested (or False)

  • search – is this a search? (boolean)

Methods

get()

get the templates_xmatches object
get()[source] ∞

get the templates_xmatches object

Return

  • webpage – the webapge HTML
